definition: reaching the sky/for days on end/incessantly
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
surname Lian
day/sky/heaven
to whine on for days (idiom)/to endlessly grumble complaints/incessant whining
cannon firing for days on end (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war

sentences.english: I am now at a very pleasant cottage window looking onto a beautiful hilly country, with a view of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我正惬意地临窗而坐，眺望远山如黛，碧海连天。

sentences.english: Again has a look us, usually meets slightly is difficult, we all complain incessantly.
sentences.chinese: 再看看我们，平时遇到一点小困难，我们都叫苦连天。

sentences.english: The road works caused much complaint among local neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 修路工程使当地居民叫苦连天。

sentences.english: The road-works caused much complaint among local neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 修路工程使当地居民叫苦连天。

sentences.english: Everything was dirt-colored, even the sky.
sentences.chinese: 一切全是土色的，连天也一样。
乏味的演讲让我呵欠连天。

sentences.english: Wars have been waged. Innocents have been slaughtered.
sentences.chinese: 为此曾经战火连天，无辜民众惨遭屠杀。

sentences.english: Are the elevators in your home going all day and all night?
sentences.chinese: 你家的电梯时连天带夜的“上上下下地享受”啊？

sentences.english: With a love that the winged seraphs of heaven Coveted her and me.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱得那样深，连天上的天使，也把我和她嫉妒。

definition: whole sky
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
to soar/to rocket
clear sky/blue sky/upright and honorable (official)
without boundary/not bordered
to shake heaven and earth (idiom)
to spring up everywhere/from all around
the blue dome of heaven
the Ninth Heaven/the highest of the heavens
really/truly/indeed
boundless/limitless
(literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
to wail like ghosts and howl like wolves (idiom)
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
far away/thousands of miles/10000 li
Wan Li (1916-2015), PRC politician
in Daoism, astral wind on which immortals may ride/strong wind
